unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Hardik's back? Hope he's not pulling a "Dhoom" stunt and hiding an injury! Also, what's the word from the BCCI on Bumrah? Last I heard, it wasn't looking good. Praying he recovers before the next big series. Anyone know if the NCA is helping with his rehab? Get well soon, yaar!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Hardik's back? Hope he's not pulling a "Dhoom" stunt and hiding an injury! Also, what's the word from the B C C I on Bumrah? Last I heard, it wasn't looking good.
